version_description: Fixed mapping to native maps

The app now offers:

- View Menu items
- Ability to join waitlist
- Order catering meals to-go
- History of past orders for easier reordering
Bug Fixes

- Updated Design - New colors, treatments and improved user experience.
- Bug fixes

To Go Ordering! Easily order your favorite Cracker Barrel meal to go.

Catering! Easily place your catering order for your next office lunch, get together or celebration.

Thanksgiving and Holiday Meals. Pre-order your Thanksgiving meal or Heat n Serve meal through the app. *some restrictions may apply
Location page – Improved the ability to search, find and favorite your Cracker Barrel restaurants.

We’ve made a few improvements to make your Cracker Barrel experience even better.

Enjoy our new online ordering experience. Improved navigation and check out make ordering your favorite Cracker Barrel meals easier and more convenient.

Additional enhancements to expand pay in app feature to more locations.
Classic Cracker Barrel App with online ordering, online waitlist and pay in app functionality

Features

PAY IN APP
You can now pay your ticket from your table and skip the line at the register!

FIND A LOCATION
Get directions to your favorite Cracker Barrel store or view store details with one tap.

ORDER ONLINE
We’re giving you more ways to enjoy your Cracker Barrel favorites – at select locations, we’re offering delivery and curbside pickup!

We’ve also added our Lunch and Dinner Daily specials to the app. Now, it’s easier than ever to place an order for your homestyle picks. Just select a location and pick-up time, and customize your cravings.

JOIN ONLINE WAIT LIST
Add your name to our Online Wait List before you arrive for parties up to six. Or, simply check the wait time at Cracker Barrel stores.

EXPLORE
Access our Catering and Online Gift Shop through direct links.
Geolocation fix, misc layout changes

New Location Services – this update is required to continue using location services, local pages, maps and directions. This release also includes updates to the Online Waitlist, Online Ordering and My Account features.
Waitlist Corrections
Enhanced user experience for navigation, online ordering and more.
